helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello,

I am writing to bring to your attention an issue with my recent order of
adult diapers from PharmEasy. The MRP shown on the app at the time of
purchase was ₹550, and after applying the 20% discount and ₹22 PharmEasy
credits, I was charged ₹418.

However, upon receiving the product, I noticed that the actual MRP printed
on the package is ₹490.

I request clarification regarding this discrepancy and kindly ask for a
refund of the excess amount charged.

Please assist in resolving this at the earliest.

Attached is the snap of diapers MRP and the imvoice

Regards,

Anand

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello,

I am writing to bring to your attention an issue with my recent order of adult diapers from PharmEasy. The MRP shown on the app at the time of purchase was ₹550, and after applying the 20% discount and ₹22 PharmEasy credits, I was charged ₹418.
However, upon receiving the product, I noticed that the actual MRP printed on the package is ₹490.
I request clarification regarding this discrepancy and kindly ask for a refund of the excess amount charged.
Please assist in resolving this at the earliest.
Attached is the snap of diapers MRP and the imvoice
Regards,
Anand

Hello Premnath,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern is in regards to order #655517535854657536-59302. I am sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with this order. It was never our intention to upset you by any means. 
​
​If you choose to cancel order #655517535854657536-59302, the refund amount of Rs. 855.96 will be initiated and will reflect in your payment source within 5–7 business days. 

I would request that you place a new order with us.

Once the amount gets credited to your PharmEasy wallet (refund cash), you can use the full amount in your next order, and also, there is no expiry for this amount.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.

 May I proceed with raising a status mismatch ticket to look into this matter? 
 So far no one contacted and I don’t know where my medicine are?? For which o have already paid. 
   
 Need your immediate intervention to sort out tbis  
 Thanks 
 Regards  
   
 Upender

notes.body: Hello Upender,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656132862243573760-49781.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 07 December 2025.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Upender,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656132862243573760-49781.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 07 December 2025.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

I have also attached photos of the damaged item if needed.
Request you to resolve this at the earliest.

notes.body: Hello Ashok,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #655503671135281152-72286, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine NUROKIND LC STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 2 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Ashok,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655503671135281152-72286, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine NUROKIND LC STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 2 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.

Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Rangareddy,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I tried to reach you earlier today at 12:55 PM on 6281648647, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.     I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine NUROKIND LC STRIP OF 15 TABLETS quantity in your order #655503671135281152-72286. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     I see that an issue was raised for the missing medicine. As checked, the issue is verified and a refund of Rs. 342.68 has been initiated on 10th December 2025. The refund will be credited to your payment source within 5 - 7 working days from the date of initiation. You can check with the bank's customer care using the ARN: 534403155395.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Arzoo,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is in regard to order #652653413501886464-14214.     As per the update received, we have raised a return request for the item delivered to you against the item GLUTONE 1000 SETRIA L-GLUTATHIONE & VITAMIN C EFFERVESCENT TABLETS | SKIN BRIGHTENING 15N PACK OF 6 - quantity - 1. The item will be picked up within 48 hours. Once the item is picked, it will be verified within 5 working days. Post verification, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days.      Please return only the items for which the request is raised. Item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.      We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, PharmEasy

With regards to your order #656159148621430784-51536, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

notes.body: Hello Aishwarya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!          With regard to your order #656246891016912896-83982, I understand your query related to the return request for ZINCOVIT STRIP OF 15 TABLETS (GREEN). I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under a non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.     As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.  ​  For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Aishwarya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to your order #656246891016912896-83982, I understand your query related to the return request for ZINCOVIT STRIP OF 15 TABLETS (GREEN). I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under a non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.

As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.
​
For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to your concern regarding the damaged packaging received for order #596822409941143552-97625. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.     As per the update, strong feedback is shared with the respective departments and also informs the retailer partner. They spoke with the concerned packer and trained him to adhere to the packaging SOP & improve the packaging quality.  ​   Please confirm whether you wish to raise a return request so we can take action accordingly.     Please note that if we raise a return request for the medicine, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or you can add your bank account details, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.     Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to your concern regarding the damaged packaging received for order #596822409941143552-97625. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.
 
As per the update, strong feedback is shared with the respective departments and also informs the retailer partner. They spoke with the concerned packer and trained him to adhere to the packaging SOP & improve the packaging quality.
​
Please confirm whether you wish to raise a return request so we can take action accordingly.

Please note that if we raise a return request for the medicine, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference. 

Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds

Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or you can add your bank account details, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.

Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

They spoke with the concerned packer and trained him to adhere to the packaging SOP & improve the packaging quality.  ​   Please confirm whether you wish to raise a return request so we can take action accordingly.     Please note that if we raise a return request for the medicine, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or you can add your bank account details, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.     Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to your concern regarding the damaged packaging received for order #596822409941143552-97625. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.
 
As per the update, strong feedback is shared with the respective departments and also informs the retailer partner. They spoke with the concerned packer and trained him to adhere to the packaging SOP & improve the packaging quality.
​
Please confirm whether you wish to raise a return request so we can take action accordingly.

Please note that if we raise a return request for the medicine, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference. 

Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds

Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or you can add your bank account details, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.

Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Rahul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656141022987620352-16735, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, NUROKIND PLUS RF STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES quantities of 4. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.     I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 393.16 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will be credited to your payment source within 3 to 5 working days.     You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it.      Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba

I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 164.33 will be initiated. Post initiation of the refund, the amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.

You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it. 

Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #656360190555000832-59578. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.     I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.     You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599  ​  Kindly confirm if the registered number is active or not so we can arrange a doctor call on the registered number.  ​   If I misunderstood your concern, I request you to elaborate on your concern so we will be able to assist you better.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #656360190555000832-59578. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.

notes.body: Hello ​Shivam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern regarding the order #655663360043909120-58327. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.  ​   Please note that we are unable to view the images shared from your end.  ​   Kindly share the name of the product along with the images of the product in JPEG or PNG format with the (PharmEasy QR code) barcode (white color sticker) and the batch number (MRP and Manufacturer details) so that we can take further action.     However, we can proceed with a return request for the same.     Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.   ​  You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.  ​  Click on the link to set the refund preference:  https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.  ​   ​Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello ​Shivam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern regarding the order #655663360043909120-58327. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

Please note that we are unable to view the images shared from your end.

Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.

Click on the link to set the refund preference:
https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds

notes.body: Hello Richa,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #655846347259723776-55233, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, ACTIBILE 300MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS quantity of 1. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.     I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 384.41 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will be credited to your payment source within 3 to 5 working days.     You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it.      Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Ravindra,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern in regard to the Doctor teleconsultation.     With regards to your order #656360304921575424-61523, upon checking, I see that your order was cancelled on 07th December 2025 at 08:59 AM.  ​   The refund amount of Rs. 10.82 was initiated on 07th December 2025, and the refund has been credited to your PharmEasy wallet (Refund cash) you can use the full amount in your next order and also there is no expiry for this amount. To check your PharmEasy wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the wallet section to see the balance amount.     The refund amount of Rs. ​2383.11 was initiated on ​07th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays).
